projects: [{"title":"Pricing Strategy for KPMG client","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"Developed an effective pricing strategy for my client having a global presence. The complexity of the project involved developing multiple pricing strategies based on the regional market presence and market size. Used @RISK and @PrecissionTree tools to develop effective options for differential pricing. My work allowed me to be received exceptional client rating."},{"title":"GDPR requirements for leading technology client >$2trillion","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Nov 2019","description":"Worked on GDPR and supplier risk audit strategies for a leading technology client for EY."},{"title":"Pipeline Dashboard","start_date":"Aug 2016","end_date":"Sep 2017","description":"My project involved preparing Spotfire based dashboard to analyze the pipeline for the EY risk service line. The dashboard provided a holistic view to the management to effectively forecast the actual performance based on margin percentages, revenues and expenses generated per region, and employee. The project grew from 1 member team to a 19 member team, which I lead and trained. The project helped my team win the 'Highest Performing Team' award."},{},{}]
